> <OLD>
>
> Tucson banks a turn upon getting Lord Elders transmission.  He turns to
> Rodimus.
>
> " I copy Lord Elder, on my way.  Rodimus, the Ark is yours now.  The
> Matrix chose you for a reason.  Now prove it right.  When I find out who
> trapped Nightshift, I will be sure they answer for what they have done.
> Tell Leo Prime that anyone who has committed a crime against this planet's
> ecosystem and environment, is to be brought to me for sentencing.  I am
> the planets guardian, and I have been entrusted to see to its protection.
> "
>
> He flies on strong yet fast wings, as his long tail gracefully follows
> behind him, shimmering off the reflection of the sun.

<NEW>

RODIMUS PRIME soared through the skies as well as he and the TUCSON
led the MAXIMALS back toward the ARK.

"I will tell him." RODIMUS said as he flew onward. "It is good to know
that the Earth has a a new guardian . .  and the Maximals."

> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight started to woke up and tried to figureed out where she is

As NIGHTLIGHT stirred she was being held comfortingly in RODIMUS'
claws. Above her was the large form of RODIMUS flames outlightning his
figure as his wings beat carrying them through the air.

Despite the apparent heat and flames from RODIMUS, where NIGHTLIGHT
was being carried it was only pleasently warm.

Ahead of them was the ARK and below them was the rest of the MAXIMALS
finally making their way back. It was home.

(TAG)

- Preston
